entry.title: version::addr_recv/addrMe does what?
entry.summary: The context is about a field whose purpose is not clear to the person asking. The field in question is not currently being used and the person is wondering if it can be safely ignored. The field seems to have no apparent use, but the person is curious about its existence.However, someone has suggested that the field could be used in conjunction with an IP lookup mechanism. This could be useful for discovering one's own IP address, but there are concerns about abuse. It is unclear how this field relates to a clock, but it may have some similar functionality.Overall, the purpose of this field remains a mystery and its usefulness is uncertain. It may be worth investigating further to see if it can serve any purpose or if it can be safely removed without impacting other functions.
